Directions: In a bowl, combine the applesauce, sugar, soy sauce, garlic and ginger; mix well. Pour into a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. In a skillet, brown pork chops in butter; place over applesauce mixture. Bake, uncovered, at 325 degrees F for 30 minutes or until meat is tender.
Ingredients: 6 (1/2 inch thick) boneless pork loin chops
